name: Notion Content Planner
description: Are you having a hard time managing all the content you create on social media?Here's the solution you can create and schedule your content in one space.What you can do with this planner:Manage your social media links in one spaceQuickly navigate through your social mediaSet weekly upload scheduleCreate and manage contentsSchedule your content on the calendarDon't scatter all your content all around, manage them in one space.
features: Manage your social media links in one space; Quickly navigate through your social media; Set weekly upload schedule; Create and manage contents; Schedule your content on the calendar
